title: March 23rd
description: In life there comes a day when clarity strikes, and symbolism from pivotal life experiences shines through. Surfing is a journey - just like life. Most times the "life journey" and the "surfing journey" carry each other, but sometimes the surfing takes life to a higher level. Learning to surf is learning to love life. Using the unique education furnished when traveling, valuable assets like persistence and personal change are earned. These pieces are what allow us to live life to the fullest and fulfill our dreams.
author: Frank Bellezza
